text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…It’s you again? Look here, you are being annoying. 
Why did you come here this far?
choice_data_list: I want to you to hear me out
I want to you to hear me out

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …There is nothing to talk about.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
For me you hear, I’m nothing. Nothing. An 
empty doll for others to see. That’s me.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…Working as a model was fun at first. The facial 
expressions and gestures that were required, when 
I did well I praised, it made me proud.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …So just as you’re expected, I made myself, and make it workー

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…But one day, in the city, I found myself staring at an 
advertisement featuring me, and I thought『That, who is it』.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
『It was full with the serious image, who 
is the one pretending to be beautiful』.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: But, I realized immediately. That’s “Gold City”.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I don’t know who it isー The one standing 
up and jumping, is also me.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
And then I became really scared, and I wanted 
to scream, anyway I couldn’t stay still.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: I understood that I wanted to run, run, run in a messー

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Then, I saw it… the sunset.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I arrived at a place I never knew before. I fell 
so much that my legs and stuff were muddy, and 
the one-piece I liked was in tatters.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: But the sky, I can’t understand why but it was so beautiful.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …That’s when, I thought. Ah, now, I’m myself.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
My legs ached and my lungs were about to collapse. 
Butー right now, I’m just “my own self”.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
That’s why I came to Tracen Academy. To run and run and become 
“my own self”. To engrave the proof of “Me” in everyone’s memory.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Butー
(Car Beep!)

text_block_list.name: City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
City! Thank goodness, you were here! I rang the phone a couple of 
times, didn’t you notice? It’s about time for work.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Manager… Ah, sorry, I was a bit distracted in talking… Wow, 
seriously, my call history is full.

text_block_list.name: City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
Well, anyway I’m glad to see you… Something 
happened? With that trainer.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …Well, something like that. Anyway sorry, job. Yeah, I’ll go.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, but can I go back to the academy once? 
I just need to book a training course…

text_block_list.name: City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
…Hey, City. Isn’t that enough? Your mind and body are in 
tatters, you worked hard enough. Aren’t you… tired already.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ……ah!

text_block_list.name: City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
Everyone judges you by appearance… This is already a case that 
can’t be helped. So let’s be prepared, City.

text_block_list.name: City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
I’ll be sure to guide you to be a top model. You should choose a 
stage where you can shine. Stop hurting yourself in a world that 
is not suitable for you.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Gold City:『World that isn’t suitable』…is it. Haha, maybe so. It 
was a good feeling to be dreaming, and the result is this.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Geez… Maybe it’s already time to give up.
(Engine start! Car Go Skrrr…)

Watching the car leaving, I noticed 
that something fell on the ground.

The home screen had a picture of the sky. The 
hands were surely trembling a little, it’s just, 
it was a very beautiful sunset sky.

『I want to be “myself” by running and running』Those 
words of Gold City crossed my mind.

text_block_list.name: City's Manager
text_block_list.text: City, wait here for a moment. I’ll go talk to the staff.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Mmm… I got it.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…Management is amazing. That cameraman-san is a famous person I 
know. He is able to get them to take a beautiful picture…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: After all… I wonder if this road suits me…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Ha!? E, a, you… why…!?
choice_data_list: I’m here to deliver your dream
I’m here to deliver your dream

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Dream…? What, I don’t understand what you mean…

I showed the homescreen of the mobile phone that 
I brought to Gold City who was puzzled.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Wait, haaaah!? Wait, you! Why do you have 
my smartphone…! Wait you… did you look…!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …Ah, it’s not my dream! That’s enough, I already quit!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Give it back!!
The cell phone was robbed violently.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
That’s enough, I already quit, I gave up! 
This picture, I’m gonna erase it…!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: I’ll erase it, I’ll erase it, I’ll erase it, I will…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ……Why.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Why… can’t I erase it…!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …You, what’s your deal, seriously.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
You’re vexing. Annoying. Good natured. Stalker. Stealer. Phone 
peeper. Lacks delicacy. Nagging. Annoying, annoying, annoying!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I told you my story, I told you I want to abandon 
myself!! I don’t understand why I told you all those 
things!! You, just what is your deal!!
choice_data_list: I’m just a trainer scouting for Gold City!
I’m just a trainer scouting for Gold City!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: ……heh. Ahhhhhh, geez, shut uppp!!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Then try it, you! Become my trainer, 
let me run with all my heart!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: However, if you treat me like a doll, I’ll hit you with a punch!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Gold City:『I got it』just like that… Ah, annoying.

text_block_list.name: City's Manager
text_block_list.text:
City, sorry to keep you waiting! Wait… huh? 
The one was with you a while ago…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Oh, okay, I’ll talk to you later. First It’s 
work, right… So, you wait here.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
I’ll introduce you my worrywart manager. 
As my… as my trainer in charge.
